about_the_game:
WOLFMAN, is a survival horror game about hunting a wolfman. You can play against a wolfman controlled by AI.

WOLFMAN is a survival horror game that takes you on a thrilling quest to hunt down one of the most terrifying creatures in history. The wolfman, controlled by AI, is a formidable foe that will test your skills, courage, and determination to the limit. To succeed in this mission, you must be both smart and brave.

Eyewitness accounts describe the wolfman as an immense, almost unimaginable creature, with strength that rivals the most powerful beasts of nature. Moreover, this creature possesses an uncanny ability to vanish without a trace, as if it were a ghost. For years, hunters, adventurers, and scientists have tried every possible method to find this legendary beast. Yet, none have been able to provide definitive proof of its existenc until now.

You are a determined wolfman hunter, ready to unveil the dark secrets that have long shrouded this myth. Your mission is not just to end the rumors, but to confront the deep-seated fears of humanity and prove that the wolfman is not just a tale or a figment of imagination. His existence is so real that the coldness of this truth will seep into your very bones. However, you must remember the perilous nature of your mission; hunting this beast means feeling the cold breath of death on your neck at every moment.

You embark on a journey into the most remote and uncharted wildernesses of Portugal. These lands are renowned for their mysterious forests, rugged mountains, and deep valleys. Yet, behind this beauty lies the harsh reality of predators like the wolfman, and the unforgiving nature of the wild. To survive, you must use your ammunition wisely, meticulously study the terrain, and remain constantly alert to the dangers of the wilderness. When night falls and the howls of the wolfman echo through the forests, it won’t just be your courage that keeps you alive, but your very instinct for survival.

With every step, you face the possibility of encountering one of nature’s most dangerous predators. Escaping the deadly traps set for you will require a combination of skill and cunning. This journey will not only bring you face to face with the wolfman, but also with your own fears. If you fail, the wilderness of Portugal will swallow you whole, forever.

This is as much a battle for survival as it is a journey into the dark recesses of the human soul. Your mission is to ensure that you do not lose yourself in this darkness, and to forever blur the line between legend and reality by hunting down the wolfman.

As the Hunter

  • Gather a team of wolfman hunters from among your friends or set out alone.

  • Arm yourself with the most advanced equipment; your survival depends on it.

  • Use the tools at your disposal and your own cunning to increase your chances of staying alive.

  • Remember, there are other predators lurking in the dark forests.

  • Engage in a battle with an ancient creature, but always keep in mind that sometimes the hunter becomes the hunted.

  • Track the signs and try to predict the creature's movements in advance.

  • Adapt to the natural conditions and use your surroundings carefully to gain an advantage.

  • Manage the resources you find along the way wisely; every bullet and supply can be crucial for your survival.

General Features

  • Single-player mode.

  • Online co-op mode with up to 4 players against an AI-controlled wolfman.

  • The game is being developed on the Unreal Engine 5.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not suitable for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (Only 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (Only 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (64bit) or equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 2050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
